text: There will be no power supply from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. on Friday in the following areas of the city owing to maintenance work to be taken up on power lines under the Tiruchi 110 kV substation: Kumaran Nagar, Srinivasa Nagar South and North, Ramalinga Nagar South and North, Canara Bank Colony, Woraiyur, Fathima Nagar, Tyagaraja Nagar, Sakthi Nagar, Vekkaliamman Kovil, Minnappan Street, Panickan Street, Kuzhumani Road, Takkar Road, Lingam Nagar, Kamatchi Amman Kovil, Seerathoppu, Sathanur, Palayam Bazaar, Walajah Road, CSI Road, and Kalnayakkan Street.
title: Power shutdown
